task_background: Prepare the coastal marine research station for immediate response to a toxic algal bloom by organizing equipment, repairing broken tools, and ensuring all monitoring systems are operational.

tasks.task_description: Place the radio_transceiver_1 on the emergency_procedures_board_1.
Find the heaviest, black item on the central_workbench_1 and place it in the wet_lab_section.
Repair the broken_centrifuge_1 using the toolbox_1.
Use the dusting_cloth_1 to dust the glass_beaker_1.
